front.title: OAuth 2.0 Introspection over the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP)

abstract.t: This document defines a method for a client or resource server to query an OAuth authorization server to determine meta- information about an OAuth token using the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) [4]. An client in possession of a OAuth2 token can use it to get metadata about the token like validity and approved scopes.
